verbs.description: Mrs. Trump [V: had] been experiencing an issue with her kidney that her office described as benign but requiring medical attention .
Mrs. Trump had [V: been] experiencing an issue with her kidney that her office described as benign but requiring medical attention .
[ARG0: Mrs. Trump] had been [V: experiencing] [ARG1: an issue with her kidney that her office described as benign but requiring medical attention] .
Mrs. Trump had been experiencing [ARG1: an issue with her kidney] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: her office] [V: described] [ARG2: as benign but requiring medical attention] .
Mrs. Trump had been experiencing an issue with her kidney that [ARG0: her office] described as benign but [V: requiring] [ARG1: medical attention] .
